titles.title: Neighbor to Neighbor Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow non-itemizers a deduction for a portion of their charitable contributions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/4/2000--Introduced. Neighbor to Neighbor Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a non-itemizer to deduct up to $500 ($1,000 on a joint return) annually in charitable contributions.
